item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: Headers # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Emphasis italics, *asterisks* or _underscores_. Bold, **asterisks** or __underscores__. Combined emphasis with **asterisks and _underscores_**. Strikethrough, ~~Scratch this.~~ italics, asterisks or underscores. Bold, asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough, Scratch this. List 1. First ordered list item 2. Another item 4. And another item. * Unordered list can use asterisks - Or minuses + Or pluses First ordered list item Another item And another item.
